bug.short_desc: Keydown event listener won't be called if added into capture phase

long_desc.thetext:
Mind you have a focus able widget which is currently focused. This widget has a listener for keydown event but added into the capture phase. You will recognize, that the listener will never called. Add the listener in default (target) phase and will be called like expected.
Recommended to call listeners on this case even if its added into capture phase.
Just to point you to the corresponding framework classes:
qx.event.dispatch.AbstractBubbling#dispatchEvent collects capture and bubble event listeners beginning from parent of target DOM element, which excludes the listeners on the target.
Here is a playground example: http://tinyurl.com/plsvawv
